answers.answer: This is my third ababy. My first one I lost 15 pounds an I only gained that back. Was same weight from bringing to end. My second I lost 12 lbs only gained that back. Now this one I lost about 10 pounds. I'm almost 19 weeks and still haven't gained anything
I was 171 b4 pregnancy but due to morning sickness n stress I'm 149 n I'm 16.2 weeks. My apatite picked up. But no weight gain. My OB hasn't said anything either
I have lost almost 20lbs and i am only 9 weeks.  I am sure i will pick it back up! I gained about 35 to 40 with my first baby!

I'm 32 weeks and still losing weight. Doc said as long as little guy is measuring fine and sounds healthy it's nothing to be concerned about. I wouldn't worry as long as your little one is doing good.

question: I'm 17weeks went to the Dr today and I've lost a total of 12lbs I was overweight to begin with is this normal? My Dr seemed ki and luckily no sign of gestational diabetes my Dr seemed kind of concerned but said we'll see as I get farther along anyone else experience this?
title: 12 lb weight loss
